reference_summary:
Colloidal Oatmeal Lotion by Lucky Super Soft, Moisturizing Lotion with Natural Oatmeal, Non-Scented, Fragrance Free, No Parabens and Phatalates, Perfect for Face and Whole Body, 12 bottles, 12 fl.oz.
Lucky Super Soft
{'Brand': 'Lucky Super Soft', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '144.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body, Face', 'Package Dimensions': '13.46 x 8.35 x 6.57 inches; 10.58 Pounds'}
These are absolutely perfect for my dry skin! I am on accutane and have really dry skin. This has been a perfect solution. I like it better than comparable brands like aveeno. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and NOT oily. It has a slight oatmeal scent that smells good but it is not overpowering at all. It feels like such quality going into my skin. I am obsessed. It is nice it comes in such a large quantity because I have a bottle at work at home and everywhere!
Perfect!
YUHFERA Press on Nails Kit 30Pcs Fake Nails Short Coffin Nail Tips with Designs Solid Color Full Cover False Nails Set Artificial Acrylic Nails for DIY Nail Art Salon Women Girls Gift(Blue bird)
YUHFERA
{'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'YUHFERA', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 1.06 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '785382442227'}
Ok. I do not have very long finger nails. These press on nails were shorter than my actual nail. It looked terrible because my finger nail was poking out the other side. I didn’t want to clip my nails down just for a set of press on nails that were way too short. I am not into super long gaudy nails, but these are not even a natural length. However, if you are happy with the length, the stickers included to press the mails on to are pretty good! They lasted well and came off my nail easily when I needed them off.
Great stickers, super short nails
Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Gryph & IvyRose
{'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
This lotion has a very subtle scent. If that is what you are into, it is a great purchase. It does moisturize well and I feel confident letting my daughter use it since it is made of quality materials. The little bottle is cute and easy to use. I love the fact that it is made of natural ingredients.
Very subtle scent
21pcs with storage box for girls big bow hairpin ribbon full cover flower hairpin baby toddler hair accessories
Havtyyise
{'Brand': 'Havtyyise', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Material': 'Linen', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '3.55 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
The little box these come in is absolutely adorable! I love that they come in a cute little storage bin. I also love that they come with duplicates of each one for little pigtails. These are perfect for a toddler and they have nice fabric underneath to keep them from pulling the hair!
So sweet!
A24 Cleansing Oil - Makeup Remover, Deep Cleansing, Non-Stripping, 99.75% Natural Ingredients, Vegan Formula, Ideal for All Skin Types… (Cleansing Oil to Foam)
A24
['A24 Oil to Foam Cleansing Oil is a product that combines “oil and moisture balance” and “powerful cleansing”. When it comes into contact with water, it is a cleansing oil that changes from a light oil texture to a dense foam texture. Its unique transforming texture will result in a thoroughly cleansed and balanced skin to enhance efficacy of the skin care products to follow. 6 premium plant based oils are a powerful lipid soluble antioxidant to soften, moisturize and nourish the skin. It also helps remove dirt and impurities deep within pores.']
{'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'A24', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Material Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'A24'}
This makeup remover is really oily. Leaves my face feeling really oily. Also, it does not remove waterproof eye makeup well at all.
Super oily

["What's in Yachyee Relaxing Gifts for Women:", '--- 12 oz Rose Gold insulated stainless steel tumbler with a reusable straw and cleaning brush, with the words ""Beauty begins the moment you love yourself"". --- Flower Petal Bath Bombs, drop them into the tub to relax among the delicate aromas of vanilla and lavender petals. --- Scented Candle, made of 100% soy wax, luxurious and all-natural, can immediately turn your space into a little serene and peaceful flower garden. --- Rose Bar Soap, made with natural flower essential oil to bring you to a dreamland of lavender cloud. --- Beautiful Key Bottle Opener and heart shape Wine Bottle Stopper --- Greeting Card, you can write your special blessing to her. 🎈 DON\'T FORGET TO SELECT ""THIS ORDER CONTAINS A GIFT"" AT CHECKOUT TO ADD YOUR FREE PERSONALIZED MESSAGE THROUGH AMAZON.🎈 50th 60th 40th birthday gifts for women 30th birthday gifts for her get well soon gift basket gifts for women gift basket for women self care gifts for women sister birthday gifts from sister']

I love that this gift comes packaged and ready. I threw a card and a bow on top and was able to give it to my sister in law for her birthday. She enjoyed it. It is a nice option for the people you never know what to get!
Easy gift!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Preference:** User prioritizes moisturizing products for dry, sensitive skin, favoring formulations without harsh chemicals. 
- **Ingredient Focus:** Prefers natural ingredients like oatmeal, shea butter, and coconut oil, and values fragrance-free options free from parabens and sulfates.
- **Product Form:** Exhibits a strong preference for lightweight lotions that hydrate without greasiness and appreciates effective application tools.
- **Quantity Preference:** Enjoys larger product sizes for practicality and sustainability in skincare routines.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Displays loyalty to natural, cruelty-free brands with a focus on high-quality materials.
- **Review Behavior:** Provides mostly positive feedback but has recently shared critiques regarding product effectiveness and practicality, with specific mention of the functionality of accessories and their fit during use.
- **Nail Care Preference:** Prioritizes practicality in nail and hair care products suitable for daily use.
- **Emerging Interests:** Shows a growing interest in thoughtfully designed hair accessories that blend aesthetics with function. Their recent experience includes purchasing elegant hair accessories, indicating a preference for items that are not only beautiful but also practical. This aligns with their appreciation for ready-to-gift options, showcasing a desire for practicality in beauty gifts. The user is willing to explore new products while maintaining high standards for quality and performance. 

This updated profile reflects the user's commitment to quality, practicality, and thoughtful gifting within their beauty and self-care interactions, while also highlighting their growing interest in elegance combined with functionality in hair accessories.
